Docs.summary: Extension methods for using with an endpoint name.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.RouteValueDictionary ParsePathByEndpointName (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.LinkParser parser, string endpointName, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.RouteValueDictionary ParsePathByEndpointName(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.LinkParser parser, string endpointName, valuetype Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function ParsePathByEndpointName (parser As LinkParser, endpointName As String, path As PathString) As RouteValueDictionary
static member ParsePathByEndpointName : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.LinkParser * string * Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.RouteValueDictionary

public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.RouteValueDictionary? ParsePathByEndpointName (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.LinkParser parser, string endpointName, Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.PathString path);

Docs.param: The endpoint name. Used to resolve endpoints.
Docs.summary: Attempts to parse the provided using the route pattern specified by the matching .
Docs.returns: A with the parsed values if parsing is successful; otherwise null.

remarks.para: will attempt to first resolve instances that match and then use the route pattern associated with each endpoint to parse the URL path.
The parsing operation will fail and return null if either no endpoints are found or none of the route patterns match the provided URI path.
